root.name: The second guest
root.description: The second guest is an episodic point click adventure. The first release will include the first two episodes of a planned total of five episodes. The artstyle is inspired by the works of Tim Burton and Edward Gorey and a 2D play on dark horror themes and comic style. The player will step into the shoes of young Jack who is invited to witness the reading of a will in an old spooky castle. Once he arrives, a terrifying tale of murder and betrayal begins to unfold as he discovers that the former owner was murdered and the heirs seem to be the next on the list.
